name: Survival (itch) (VCP)
description:
Survival is about a normal guy who finds himself in a very sticky situation.                                                                                            

One minute he was just resting on the top of the tallest (  when I say tallest, I mean.........TALL EST ) building.

Next minute later, ALIENS ARE INVADING THE CITY !!!!!!!

Armed with only a shotgun and some knives if he can find them, our hero has to fight through hordes of aliens, manage his ammo and stamina ( he's not exactly in tip-top shape ) and try to reach the bottom of the seemingly endless building he's on top of while each floor crumbles below him.

This game is about fast-paced retro shooting action, resource management.....

but above all...........

it's about SURVIVAL

Controls:

z = shoot

x= reload

UpArrow=Jump

Left and Right Arrow=Move left and right 

Collectibles, High Score and Lowest floor reached can be found in the pause menu by pressing escape
